definition: thin piece of wood used a writing tablet (in ancient China)/a kind of official document (in former times)/letter/note/plague
to record/to note/to memorize/to remember/mark/sign/classifier for blows, kicks, shots

sentences.english: This article was reading notes about Taixuan, the department of literature research.
sentences.chinese: 本文是一篇閱讀《太玄》的讀書札記，系文獻研究。

sentences.english: So, welcome to the Gates Notes.
sentences.chinese: 所以歡迎來帶蓋茨札記。

definition: to mark a text with dots and circles/to punctuate
lit. floating wine goblets on a stream/the origin (of some phenomenon)
study of classic texts, including interpretation, glossaries and commentaries
to annotate/to add marginal comments on/criticism/marginalia
A New Account of the Tales of the World, collection of anecdotes, conversations, remarks etc of historic personalities, compiled and edited by Liu Yiqing 劉義慶|刘义庆[Liu2 Yi4 qing4]
variant character/loan word/variant written form (for the same word)/different edition
to interpret and make glossaries and commentaries on classic texts
to comment/a point by point commentary

notes on poetry, an essay genre consisting of informal commentary on poems and poets and their lives (old)/a genre of narrative literature interspersing prose with poetry, popular in the Tang and Song dynasties
Lu Ji (261-303), Chinese writer and literary critic
